  "Initiated By" : "FLORIDA DIVISION OF SECURITIES AND INVESTOR PROTECTION",
  "Allegations" : "ON NOVEMBER 7, 1995, THE FLORIDA DEPARTMENT OF BANKING AND FINANCE ISSUED AN ADMINISTRATIVE COMPLAINT, DENIAL OF REGISTRATION AND NOTICE OF RIGHTS AGAINST RESPONDENT BERTRUM S. BECKOFF, PRESIDENT AND PRINCIPAL OF ARGUS SECURITIES, INC. THE DEPARTMENT'S COMPLAINT ALLEGES THAT THE RESPONDENT VIOLATED THE NASD RULES OF FAIR PRACTICE WHICH RESULTED IN VIOLATIONS OF PROVISIONS OF CHAPTER 517, FLORIDA STATUTES, AND THE RULES OF THE DEPARTMENT. THE DEPARTMENT SEEKS TO DENY, REVOKE, RESTRICT, OR SUSPEND ANY REGISTRATION PREVIOUSLY GRANTED TO RESPONDENT BY THE DEPARTMENT; ORDER RESPONDENT TO CEASE AND DESIST VIOLATIONS OF FLORIDA LAW AND RULES; AND IMPOSE FINES OF UP TO $5,000 PER VIOLATION. RESPONDENT MAY REQUEST A HEARING WITHIN TWENTY-ONE DAYS OF RECEIPT OF THIS ADMINISTRATIVE COMPLAINT.",
  "Resolution" : "Stipulation and Consent",
  "SanctionDetails" : [ ],
  "Sanction Details" : "ON JULY 3, 1996, THE FLORIDA DEPARTMENT OF BANKING AND FINANCE ISSUED A FINAL ORDER ADOPTING THE STIPULATION AND CONSENT AGREEMENT REGARDING RESPONDENTS ARGUS SECURITIES, INC. AND BERTRUM S. BECKOFFF. THE FINAL ORDER INCORPORATED THE STIPULATION AND CONSENT AGREEMENT, DATED 5/21/96. PURSUANT TO THE STIPULATION AND CONSENT AGREEMENT RESPONDENTS ARGUS SECURITIES, INC. AND BERTRUM S. BECKOFF AGREE TO PAY A CUSTOMER $1,500 AND TO VOLUNTARILY DISMISS ANY AND ALL PETIONS FOR FORMAL HEARING FILED WITH THE DIVISION OF ADMINISTRATIVE HEARINGS AGAINST THE DEPARTMENT OF BANKING AND FINANCE.",
